Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases leading to Request Payment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases where the next activity is Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases successfully ending with Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to the next Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that were initially Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that require director's approval before Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases ending with Payment Handled without prior rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'
